Merge with observed values

Source: R/alter_nc.R
get_merge_observed.Rd

Add to a "ERA5" daily file an observed "ECA" variable. The observed time set could be reduced in order to fit the "ERA5" time set.

get_merge_observed(
  data_era,
  data_obs,
  name_col = paste(data_obs$station_info$name, data_obs$var_info$name, sep =
    data_era$sep)
)

Arguments

data_era

"ERA5" list to add.

data_obs

Observed variable to add.

name_col

name of the column in the data frame.

Value

the new "ERA5" list with the observed value added.
